entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
